Title: ngramSearchCaseInsensitiveUTF8
Description: Provides a case-insensitive variant of ngramSearchUTF8 in which needle and haystack.
haystack: First UTF-8 encoded comparison string. String literalneedle: Second UTF-8 encoded comparison string. String literal
Value between 0 and 1 representing the likelihood of the needle being in the haystack. Float32
The bigger the result is, the more likely needle is in the haystack.
